name: Age of Gladiators II: Rome
description: Age of Gladiators II: Rome is a single-player strategy/management sim set at the height of the bloody gladiatorial games in ancient Rome. As your fighters increase in level, it will be up to you to decide how to forge their attributes and abilities. Build your story. Build your empire.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Dual-core 1.8GHz or equivalent processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory Storage: 760 MB available space
